text:
When running Watchdog as part of the tomcat release, it crashes with a 
NoClassDefFoundError for org.apache.tools.ant.launcher or something like that.  
The class was moved from ant.jar to ant-launcher.jar for the Ant 1.6 release, 
and the watchdog build.xml file should be modified accordingly.  A diff is 
attached to this bugzilla issue showing the needed change: it's a piece of cake 
and does not present backwards-compatability problems as the file did not exist 
prior to Ant 1.6.
